name: Gear Rise
description:
In a world where little light remains, a band of bright gears rises.

How far can you rise in the sea ruled by the dark gears?

Swipe left and right to move the gears of light.

More than a 100 randomized handcrafted levels, dozens of shifting obstacles & characters to unlock.

Gear Rise is the newest avoidance platformer, easy to learn, difficult to master.

Unique look and original music. Endless gameplay. Unlimited fun.
